entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:44 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -28.7°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow at times. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h early this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
